/ci/intro.name: Intro
/ci/intro.description: Learn about basic Nx Cloud knowledge.

itemList.name: Tutorials
itemList.description: Tutorials setting up CI with Nx

/ci/intro/tutorials.name: Tutorials
/ci/intro/tutorials.description: Tutorials setting up CI with Nx

/ci/features.name: Features
/ci/features.description: Features of Nx and Nx Cloud that improve CI

itemList.name: Run Only Tasks Affected by a PR
itemList.description: This allows to only run tasks on projects that got changed in a given PR.

itemList.name: Use Remote Caching (Nx Replay)
itemList.description: Learn how to enable remote caching s.t. you don't just benefit locally from it but also in CI.

itemList.name: Distribute Task Execution (Nx Agents)
itemList.description: Learn how to efficiently distribute tasks across machines to take full advantage of parallelization. Nx Agents make this a trivial task.

itemList.name: Automatically Split E2E Tasks (Atomizer)
itemList.description: Learn how Nx can automatically split e2e tests into fine-grained chunks for a much better distribution on Nx Agents.

itemList.name: Identify and Re-run Flaky Tasks
itemList.description: Learn how Nx Cloud is able to automatically identify flaky tasks and re-run them for you.

itemList.name: Dynamically Allocate Agents
itemList.description: Learn how to dynamically allocate agents based on the size of a PR, keeping the balance of speed and cost.

/ci/features/affected.name: Run Only Tasks Affected by a PR
/ci/features/affected.description: This allows to only run tasks on projects that got changed in a given PR.

/ci/features/remote-cache.name: Use Remote Caching (Nx Replay)
/ci/features/remote-cache.description: Learn how to enable remote caching s.t. you don't just benefit locally from it but also in CI.

/ci/features/distribute-task-execution.name: Distribute Task Execution (Nx Agents)
/ci/features/distribute-task-execution.description: Learn how to efficiently distribute tasks across machines to take full advantage of parallelization. Nx Agents make this a trivial task.

/ci/features/split-e2e-tasks.name: Automatically Split E2E Tasks (Atomizer)
/ci/features/split-e2e-tasks.description: Learn how Nx can automatically split e2e tests into fine-grained chunks for a much better distribution on Nx Agents.

/ci/features/flaky-tasks.name: Identify and Re-run Flaky Tasks
/ci/features/flaky-tasks.description: Learn how Nx Cloud is able to automatically identify flaky tasks and re-run them for you.

/ci/features/dynamic-agents.name: Dynamically Allocate Agents
/ci/features/dynamic-agents.description: Learn how to dynamically allocate agents based on the size of a PR, keeping the balance of speed and cost.
